subject: Search Results as Tree of Topic Threads - needed! - how?
msgSnippet: Hi, I will not sequentially scroll throw more than 22.000 postings, this way the forum is useless. Please provide a tree view of topics and its replies. Or is
messageBody:
Hi, I will not sequentially scroll throw more than 22.000 postings, this way the forum is useless.

Please provide a tree view of topics and its replies.

Or is there any secret link I missed?

See you then. t
